price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߏ߬ ߖߎ߯ߡߊ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߓߍ߲߬ ߡߊ߬ߣߍ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ ߣߌ߫ ߢߊ߯ߟߋ߲ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
